QuestData.Title: By Any Means Necessary
QuestData.Description: I don't know what to make of all of this, but I do know how we can find more clues.$B$BEmpoor is a Broken merchant that traffics in all sorts of goods and information. If you were to persuade him to talk, I'm sure he might have something interesting to say.$B$BHe travels the road here between Tuurem and Shattrath. Watch out, though -- he travels with a bodyguard.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Empoor on the road between Tuurem and Shattrath City in Terokkar Forest. Convince him to tell you what he knows.
QuestData.RewardText: Fine, fine... I'll tell you what I know, but it's not much!
